pr_title: Remove Guava from SDK extensions, except zpages

timeline.message: Remove Guava from SDK extensions, except zpages

timeline.body:
```suggestion
    while ((read = is.read(buf)) > 0) {
```

Although -1 should also work according to <https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/io/InputStream.html#read-byte:A->, I think this is slightly more clear.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
while ((read = is.read(buf)) != -1) {
while ((read = is.read(buf)) > 0) {

Although -1 should also work according to https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/io/InputStream.html#read-byte:A-, I think this is slightly more clear.
timeline.author: Oberon00

timeline.body: A bit of a shame that we have to duplicate this. But I guess that is the best way, we don't want to be in the business of providing some public utils artifact.

replies.bodyText: I'll migrate Ec2Resource to use this class instead of duplicating logic soon :)
